page.title: 13ROADS NEAR WEST WRATTING
page.content: Only minor roads serve the villages.West Wratting High Street is currently being rebuilt as it was originally built layer by layer onto a farm track without proper foundat- ions.The state of the roads is good, considering that they are regularly used by large farm machinery and heavy lorries which tend to break up the edges of the roads. Patching operations take place frequently. Isolated farms are well sign- posted and have easy access. In winter snow clearance might be slow as major roads come first. This is usually carried out by the local farmers etc. using special equipment or by the plant hire business in West Wratting (of whom the villagers are quite protective when it comes to complaints).
